amendment.description: To provide for the disposal of federal surplus property to historic light stations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4905 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4905 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S9066; text: CR S9066) To provide for the disposal of federal surplus property to historic light stations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4905 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4905 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
